short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: chrome extension to grab the order info from amazon order page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help people grab their orders info and save it to subscription based on amz-planet. To use this extension, user must registered on amz-planet for a token.
